name: ★Fallalypse ★ Disconnect ❄
detailed_description:
An apocalypse hit Earth when the artificial intelligence rebelled and turned people into zombies with help of a virus. Then came the war of the Space Forces of Earth against machines and zombies. The war ended with the victory of the Space Forces.

Watch cities being restored on Earth devastated by the war. 

It's a passive construction game: Select a location on the world map to place your base and watch NPCs building the base by demolishing buildings into parts and using them for construction, or you can see how other bases are developing if other players haven't closed access to their bases for you. You can also lock your base for other players so that only you can watch the development of your base. Your computer’s resources are used by the game AI to develop the base.

Later the Player mode will be added to the game where you will be able to visit these bases and communicate with NPCs.

MAIN GAME FEATURES:

❄ Locate your base on the world map;
❄ NPCs able to demolish old and build new constructions;
❄ Watch the development of the world by NPCs.
